Name: Dragonfruit
Description: Multiply event score by 10% and multiply status gain/loss by 5%

Name: Grape
Description: Ignore death for 1 turn and multiply event score by 10%

Name: Pineapple
Description: Ignore death for 1 turn and multiply status gain/loss by 10%

Name: Cherry
Description: Multiply event score by 20% and multiply status gain/loss by 10%

Name: Rambutan
Description: Revive with 50 stats for each status
